title: useDeferredValue for Deferred Rendering
instructions:
Create a search component using useDeferredValue to defer expensive renders.

Requirements:
1. Create a search input that controls displayed results
2. Use useDeferredValue to defer the search results rendering
3. Show visual feedback when results are stale (deferred value !== current value)
4. Compare with and without useDeferredValue
5. Display a large list that's expensive to render

useDeferredValue lets you defer updating a part of the UI. It's similar to useTransition but works with values instead of state updates.
